reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The main objective of this proposed project is to enable the tribal of Wayand to get land through FRA to lead a life with human dignity. Last four years AAS is active to introduce the FRA in Wayanad with the help of SF . It helped the organization to under stand the real situation of different tribal communities in this district. AAS alone cannot achieve the goal, there is the need of strengthening NAA in the state and collective effort is needed. There is the need of educate the communities on PESA , 5th sc hedule , FRA and community rights at least in tribal concentrated district of Kerala. For this implementation process some additional and supportive programs are needed to empower the adivasies in the project area .The proposed programs will support the so cio-economic, political and educational aspects for the sustainability of adivasies. There is the need of empower the adivasies to get government facilities for the betterment of tribal communities. So to empower the adivasies to protect their human and co nstitutional rights AAS proposes different programs and activities for the next three years rights. There will be facilitation programs on different topics like FRA, PESA and 5th Schedule, Tribal sub Plans Environment, Global Warming and Climate Change etc . There will be get together and consultations, education and legal assistances. Follow up of different programs which were implemented in the last years also will be done. Common action plans are chocked out by giving emphasis on Protection of forest and forest rights of the adivasies, protection of human rights.
